Key Match Events: Elly De La Cruz had three hits with four RBIs and scored twice
Rhett Lowder held Pittsburgh scoreless on five hits through five innings
Billy Cook had a home run among his two hits for the Pirates
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds (76-80), who won the opener of the three-game set on Friday, have won five of their past eight games
Cincinnati starting pitcher Rhett Lowder (2-2) held Pittsburgh scoreless on five hits through five innings
Others: Jared Jones gave up six runs on six hits while striking out five in five innings
Jones gave up six runs on six hits while striking out five in five innings
Isiah Kiner-Falefa singled with one out and Oneil Cruz drew a two-out walk, prompting a visit from pitching coach Derek Johnson
Nick Gonzales followed with a single to load the bases, but Lowder got Bryan De La Cruz to fly out
